description: Learn how to make authentic Italian peach biscuits with this delicious recipe from Woolworths team member Maria Di Battista from the Preston South store.
name: Italian Peach Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To decorate, combine juice and a little colouring in a small bowl. Place sugar in a small bowl. Dip biscuits in juice, then coat in sugar. Transfer to a tray. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Top each biscuit with a mint leaf. Serve.
